functions.name: IsAspire
functions.documentation: Returns true if the script is running inside Aspire.

signature.label: IsAspire()
signature.documentation: Returns true if the script is running inside Aspire.

functions.name: MessageBox
functions.documentation: Displays a message box with passed text to user. The text can include HTML formatting.

signature.label: MessageBox(text: string)
signature.documentation: Displays a message box with passed text to user.

parameters.label: text
parameters.documentation: Text to display in the message box (can include HTML formatting)

classes.name: Point2D
classes.documentation: Represents a 2D point (X and Y values only). Used by many other objects and can be used with geometry objects such as Vector2D to perform calculations.

constructors.label: Point2D()
constructors.documentation: Constructs an un-initialised point with invalid x and y values.

constructors.label: Point2D(x: number, y: number)
constructors.documentation: Creates a new point with the specified X and Y values.

parameters.label: x
parameters.documentation: The value for the x coordinate of the point

parameters.label: y
parameters.documentation: The value for the y coordinate of the point

constructors.label: Point2D(pt: Point2D)
constructors.documentation: Creates a new point with the same X and Y values as the passed point.

parameters.label: pt
parameters.documentation: An existing point to copy X and Y values from

properties.name: X
properties.documentation: X coordinate for point (read/write)

properties.name: x
properties.documentation: X coordinate for point (read/write)

properties.name: Y
properties.documentation: Y coordinate for point (read/write)

properties.name: y
properties.documentation: Y coordinate for point (read/write)

properties.name: IsInvalid
properties.documentation: Returns true if the point is invalid - not initialised or SetInvalid called

methods.name: IsCoincident
methods.documentation: Returns true if passed point is coincident with this point within passed tolerance.

signature.label: IsCoincident(point: Point2D, tol: number)
signature.documentation: Returns true if passed point is coincident with this point within passed tolerance.

parameters.label: tol
parameters.documentation: Maximum distance apart points can be and still be considered coincident

methods.name: Set
methods.documentation: Set both the x and y values for the point.

signature.label: Set(x: number, y: number)
signature.documentation: Set both the x and y values for the point.

methods.name: SetInvalid
methods.documentation: Set the point to invalid state - X and Y will be lost.

signature.label: SetInvalid()
signature.documentation: Set the point to invalid state - X and Y will be lost.

operators.documentation: Subtracting a point from another point will return a Vector2D with the difference between the 2 points.
Adding a vector to a point will return a point displaced from original point by adding the vector.
Subtracting a vector from a point will return a point displaced from original point by subtracting the vector.

classes.name: VectricJob
classes.documentation: Represents the currently open job (file) within the application. Main object for script interaction.

constructors.label: VectricJob()
constructors.documentation: Creates a new VectricJob object that refers to the current job.

properties.name: Exists
properties.documentation: Returns true if there is an existing job open

properties.name: Name
properties.documentation: Returns the name of the current job WITHOUT the file extension (e.g. 'test' not 'test.crv')

properties.name: InMM
properties.documentation: Returns true if the current units are mm

properties.name: InInches
properties.documentation: Returns true if the current units are inches

properties.name: Width
properties.documentation: Returns width of the job along x (same as XLength)

properties.name: Height
properties.documentation: Returns height of the job along y (same as YLength)

properties.name: LayerManager
properties.documentation: Returns the CadLayerManager for the job. This manages all the layers which hold all the vector objects.

properties.name: Selection
properties.documentation: Returns the SelectionList for the currently selected vectors in the job.

methods.name: Refresh2DView
methods.documentation: Refreshes the 2D view. Call this after you have created or modified geometry to update the 2D view.

signature.label: Refresh2DView()
signature.documentation: Refreshes the 2D view. Call this after you have created or modified geometry.

methods.name: GetBounds
methods.documentation: Returns the 2D bounding box for the drawing area.

signature.label: GetBounds()
signature.documentation: Returns the 2D bounding box for the drawing area.

methods.name: ImportDxfDwg
methods.documentation: Imports a DXF or DWG file from passed path. Returns true if file imported OK else false. NOTE: after data is imported it is selected.

signature.label: ImportDxfDwg(pathname: string)
signature.documentation: Imports a DXF or DWG file from passed path.

classes.name: Contour
classes.documentation: Represents a single vector within the application. Open and closed vectors, arcs, circles - all are based on a Contour with one or more spans.

constructors.label: Contour(tolerance: number)
constructors.documentation: Creates a new contour with the specified tolerance.

parameters.label: tolerance
parameters.documentation: Tolerance to use when performing operations (use 0.0 for default)

properties.name: Area
properties.documentation: Unsigned area of contour

properties.name: IsClosed
properties.documentation: True if the contour is closed

properties.name: IsOpen
properties.documentation: True if the contour is open

properties.name: Length
properties.documentation: Length of contour

properties.name: StartPoint2D
properties.documentation: The 2D position of the contour start point

properties.name: EndPoint2D
properties.documentation: The 2D position of the contour end point (same as start point if closed)

methods.name: AppendPoint
methods.documentation: Set the 2D starting point for the contour. This method should only be called on an EMPTY contour. The Z value defaults to 0.0

signature.label: AppendPoint(x: number, y: number)
signature.documentation: Set the 2D starting point for the contour.

methods.name: LineTo
methods.documentation: Append a line span from the current end point to the passed position. Returns true if span added OK.

signature.label: LineTo(x: number, y: number)
signature.documentation: Append a line span from current end point to passed position.

classes.name: Tool
classes.documentation: Represents a tool within the program. Can be created programmatically or selected from the tool database.

constructors.label: Tool(name: string, tool_type: ToolType)
constructors.documentation: Creates a new tool with the specified name and type.

parameters.label: tool_type
parameters.documentation: Type of tool (Tool.BALL_NOSE, Tool.END_MILL, Tool.VBIT, etc.)

properties.name: ToolDia
properties.documentation: Diameter of tool (read/write)

properties.name: Stepdown
properties.documentation: Stepdown for tool (read/write)

properties.name: Stepover
properties.documentation: Stepover for tool (read/write)

properties.name: FeedRate
properties.documentation: Feed rate for tool (read/write)

properties.name: PlungeRate
properties.documentation: Plunge rate for tool (read/write)

properties.name: SpindleSpeed
properties.documentation: Spindle speed for tool (read/write)

constants.name: BALL_NOSE
constants.value: Tool type constant for ball nose tools

constants.name: END_MILL
constants.value: Tool type constant for end mill tools

constants.name: VBIT
constants.value: Tool type constant for V-bit tools

constants.name: THROUGH_DRILL
constants.value: Tool type constant for drill bits
